articles.author: Saphora Smith
articles.title: Water company executive bonuses up 21% despite sewage ‘scandal’, new analysis finds
articles.description: The average annual bonus for a water company executive now stands at £670,000
articles.content:
The pay packets of water company bosses have risen by a fifth, new figures show, despite raw sewage being pumped into waterways.
Average water company executives salaries and bonuses rose by 21 per … [+3286 chars]

articles.author: Adam Forrest
articles.title: Labour demands recall of parliament over cost of living ‘emergency’
articles.description: Campaigners say early return of MPs could help lay ‘groundwork’ for more emergency support
articles.content:
Labour has written to Boris Johnson and the two Tory leadership contenders to demand parliament returns early in order to tackle the deepening cost of living emergency.
The call for MPs to return tw… [+3982 chars]

articles.author: Rob Merrick
articles.title: Rishi Sunak vows to ‘restore’ NHS dentistry admitting patients cannot get ‘care they need’
articles.description: Former chancellor seeks to switch Tory leadership campaign focus to public services with five-point plan
articles.content:
Rishi Sunak has vowed to end the crisis in NHS dentistry which is forcing some people to pull out their own teeth, stepping up his battle with Liz Truss for No 10.
A staggering 9 out 10 dental pract… [+2558 chars]

articles.author: Simon Murphy
articles.title: Fears of North-South divide after A-level grade dip
articles.description: Pupils in all parts of the country must ‘have the opportunity to succeed’, says Sutton Trust
articles.content:
A North-South regional divide has emerged in A-level results, as the first exam results since the outbreak of the Covid pandemic also showed a dip in top grades.

articles.author: Rebecca Speare-Cole
articles.title: Missing nurse could be taking trains appearing dazed or confused, say police
articles.description: The Metropolitan Police said Owami Davies has been depressed and may turn to alcohol in the absence of her medication.
articles.content:
A nurse who vanished in south London more than a month ago has been depressed and may be travelling regularly by train, appearing dazed or confused, police have said.
Owami Davies, 24, was last seen… [+2160 chars]

articles.author: Nadine White
articles.title: If Owami Davies were white, her disappearance would cause more concern
articles.description: A pervasive disregard for Black lives is the underlying reason for these dangerously inadequate responses to Black people going missing
articles.content: When Sarah Everard went missing last year, the UK rightly saw wall-to-wall media coverage as the Metropolitan Police appealed for information. Similarly, this was seen when Libby Squire went missing … [+4073 chars]

articles.author: John Rentoul
articles.title: We’re heading for a Liz Truss victory – here’s what I got wrong
articles.description: Good forecasters go back over their predictions to try to learn from their mistakes – and I thought Rishi Sunak would win, writes John Rentoul
articles.content: Dominic Cummings is not the only person who has read Superforecasting, the book by Philip Tetlock and Dan Gardner. I read it when it was published seven years ago, and thought it had important insigh… [+859 chars]

articles.author: Maya Oppenheim
articles.title: ‘Chilling’: Rise in women in UK investigated by police over illegal abortions
articles.description: ‘Women face the cruelty and distress of being investigated after a pregnancy loss or after ending their pregnancy, often waiting for years to know whether they will be charged and face trial,’ says doctor
articles.content:
Increasing numbers of women in the UK are being investigated by police on suspicion of having illegal abortions.
The latest Home Office data shows recorded crimes for abortions rose from 28 in 2020 … [+6656 chars]

articles.author: Cathy Newman
articles.title: Matt Forde’s right to grumble – I’d never have taken my babies to a comedy show
articles.description: The amount of vomit and poo they produced with effortless spontaneity would have rendered the experience miserable for all concerned
articles.content:
Comedian Matt Forde has spoken in the past about growing up on benefits in a single parent family. His mum was a former nun.
